name: Webflow proposal
description:
So you are a Webflow freelancer or someone who wants to turn their Webflow skills into a business.

You're struggling with how to write the details of a Webflow proposal, what to include and how to price deliverables.

Well, it's difficult to find a Webflow proposal out there... trust me I know.

When I first started I just wanted an insight into how other people present a Webflow proposal & how different it is from a normal Web development proposal.

Because I focus on the objectives of the project and present multiple options in a clear, simple manner, my proposals most of the time come back signed.


You can buy the full version here

https://rasheedosalem.gumroad.com/l/webflow-proposal
